Name: H2DR3c
Desc: Half Diagonal Reel on the first diagonal, end facing third corner.
CriptDesc: {Dancer} dances half a diagonal reel to end in {EndPos}
{Dancer} dances half a diagonal reel to face {Face}
{Dancer} dances half a diagonal reel to face {Face}
{Dancer} dances half a diagonal reel to end in {EndPos}
